name: vigilant-guard
description: MERN Stack Insider Threat Detection System with Dual Frontends

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../employee-portal && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start" "cd employee-portal && npm start"
scripts.dev-security: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev-employee: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd employee-portal && npm start"
